class.name: StreamPeerSSL
class.description: SSL stream peer. This object can be used to connect to SSL servers.

method.name: connect_to_stream
method.description: Connects to a peer using an underlying [StreamPeer] [code]stream[/code]. If [code]validate_certs[/code] is [code]true[/code], [StreamPeerSSL] will validate that the certificate presented by the peer matches the [code]for_hostname[/code].

method.name: get_status
method.description: Returns the status of the connection. See [enum Status] for values.

method.name: poll
method.description: Poll the connection to check for incoming bytes. Call this right before [method StreamPeer.get_available_bytes] for it to work properly.

constants.constant: A status representing a [StreamPeerSSL] that is disconnected.
A status representing a [StreamPeerSSL] that is connected to a host.
An error status that shows a mismatch in the SSL certificate domain presented by the host and the domain requested for validation.
